question: Which if the following statements is true regarding VPC endpoints?

answers.A: It uses VPN connection to establish connection with other AWS Services
answers.B: With the help of a VPC endpoint, there is no need to route traffic through the internet
answers.C: Source VPC and target resources of AWS services can be in different regions
answers.D: When creating a VPC endpoint, you need to define a source VPC and target AWS service
answers.E: In order to use a VPC endpoint, it is essential to enable a DNS resolution in a VPC
